DataElement.preferredName: Past 12 Month Marijuana Use Frequency Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to identify a period of time in the past 12 months in which a person has used marijuana.

It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa. Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any period of seven consecutive days.

Concepts.definition: Any period of seven consecutive days.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.
